content: चिंत्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} [चिंत् कर्मणि यत्] {@--1@} To be considered or thought over. {@--2@} To be discovered, to be devised or found out. {@--3@} Conceivable, comprehensible. {@--4@} Requiring consideration, doubtful, questionable, यच्च क्वचिदस्फुटालंकारत्वे उदाहृतं (यः कौमारहरः &c.) एतच्चिंत्यं <ls>S. D. 1.</ls>
